Chez PLEINGAZ, nous croyons que l'accès: At PLEINGAZ, we believe that access to quality energy should never be a concern. That's why we guarantee fast delivery and certified accessories, for your safety and peace of mind.
Explorez notre gamme de solutions énergé: Explore our range of high-quality energy solutions.
Chez PLEINGAZ, nous vous offrons bien pl: At PLEINGAZ, we offer you more than a delivery service: speed, safety, and impeccable daily customer support.
Recevez vos bouteilles de gaz directemen: Receive your gas cylinders directly to your door in record time, ensuring you never run out of energy.
Chacun de nos produits est testé et cert: Each of our products is tested and certified to meet the strictest safety standards, for total peace of mind.
Notre équipe est disponible à tout momen: Our team is available at all times to answer your questions and solve your problems, day or night.
Ce que nos clients disent de nous: What our customers say about us
La satisfaction de nos clients est notre: Our customers' satisfaction is our greatest pride. Here are their sincere opinions on our services and products.
Service client réactif, livraison ultra: Responsive customer service, ultra-fast delivery, and competitive prices. Plein Gaz has truly changed my daily life! I couldn't live without it.
La qualité des bouteilles et la sécurité: The quality of the cylinders and the safety are impeccable. This is the main reason I have remained loyal to Plein Gaz for years.
Des prix justes et un suivi excellent. C: Fair prices and excellent follow-up. It's a pleasure to do business with such a professional company.
Votre partenaire de confiance pour la li: Your trusted partner for fast, secure, and reliable gas cylinder delivery, right to your doorstep.
PLEINGAZ est une marque commerciale came: PLEINGAZ is a Cameroonian commercial brand of domestic gas, distributed by INFOTECH S.A. through its INFOTECHGAZ department. Present on the market since December 2015, PLEINGAZ has established itself as a key player in the energy sector in Cameroon.
Nos produits sont disponibles sur tout l: Our products are available nationwide through a strong and reliable distribution network. Our mission is to make domestic gas accessible to as many people as possible, by ensuring safety, reliability, and permanent availability.
En plus du gaz, PLEINGAZ propose une gam: In addition to gas, PLEINGAZ offers a complete range of accessories: gas stoves, regulators, hoses, burners, and other essential equipment for simple and safe use.
Le produit a reçu un accueil positif au: The product received a positive reception in Cameroon, with launch sales far exceeding forecasts. Since the introduction of PLEINGAZ, households dissatisfied with other brands have been satisfied and continue to trust our brand. This has been possible due to factors such as the reliability, availability, and safety of our cylinders.
Réduire les maladies liées aux feux de b: Reducing diseases related to wood fires by offering clean energy.
Économiser le temps des familles, pour q: Saving families' time, so they can focus on what matters.
Un combustible moins cher et plus effica: A fuel that is cheaper and more efficient than wood or charcoal.
Lutter contre la déforestation et le réc: Fighting against deforestation and global warming.
Soutien à l’acquisition du kit de démarr: Support for the acquisition of the starter kit for the underprivileged

Bouteille en acier robuste, livrée plein: Robust steel cylinder, delivered full of 6 kg of LPG. Ideal for small families and occasional use. This valve cylinder is easy to transport and use for all your cooking and heating needs.
Bouteille robuste contenant 12,5 kg de G: Robust cylinder containing 12.5 kg of LPG. Suitable for regular domestic needs, it offers extended autonomy for cooking and household appliances.
Grande bouteille de 50 kg pour usages in: Large 50 kg cylinder for intensive use. Ideal for restaurants, hotels, and industries. Its high-security valve guarantees risk-free use for professionals.
Table de cuisson PLEINGAZ moderne en ver: Modern PLEINGAZ tempered glass cooktop. Elegant, heat-resistant, and easy to clean, it fits perfectly into contemporary kitchens.
Robust and economical cooktop. Adapted for daily domestic use, its durable steel design makes it resistant and easy to maintain.

Brûleur à fixer directement sur la valve: Burner to be attached directly to the valve of your 6 kg cylinder. It is a simple and mobile solution, ideal for outdoor cooking, camping, or small spaces.

Un service entièrement dédié à la livrai: A service entirely dedicated to gas delivery for individuals. Order easily and receive your cylinder safely.
Personnel qualifié pour vous aider à la: Qualified personnel to assist you upon receipt.
Un service rapide et fiable pour les res: A fast and reliable service for restaurants, hotels, cafes, and bakeries.
Nos techniciens qualifiés assurent l'ins: Our qualified technicians ensure the installation of your cylinder and provide practical advice.
Nous soutenons les grossistes, les détai: We support wholesalers, retailers, and new investors who wish to distribute our brand.
Accompagnement pour investir dans la ven: Guidance for investing in gas sales.
Découvrez la gamme complète de services: Discover the full range of services that PLEINGAZ offers, whether you are an individual or a professional.
Nous sommes là pour vous servir !: We are here to serve you!
Une question, un projet ou simplement en: A question, a project, or just want to chat? Fill out the form or use the information below to reach us.
Voici les questions les plus fréquemment: Here are the most frequently asked questions about our products and services. Can't find the answer you're looking for?
faq.questions.q1: How can I place an order?
faq.answers.a1: To place an order, browse our catalog, add products to your cart, and follow the steps in the checkout process. You will receive an email confirmation once the order is validated.
faq.questions.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answers.a3: Yes, cash or Mobile Money upon receipt of the order.
faq.answers.a4_2: Express: 24h to 48h depending on your location.
faq.questions.q5: How can I track my order?
faq.answers.a5_1: You will receive an SMS/Email confirmation.
faq.answers.a5_2: Our delivery drivers will contact you before arrival.
faq.questions.q6: What is the difference between a new cylinder and a refill?
faq.answers.a6_1: New cylinder = a new full cylinder (includes the deposit).
faq.answers.a6_2: Refill = exchange of an empty cylinder for a full one (cheaper).
faq.questions.q8: How can I check my gas installation?
faq.answers.a8_3: Test with soapy water (never with a flame).
faq.questions.q9: What should I do in case of a gas leak?
faq.answers.a9_1: Do not light any flame or electrical appliance.

blog.post1.title: PleinGaz is committed to safety: our first-aid training
blog.post1.summary: Safety is our top priority. Discover how we train our staff in first aid to ensure a quick and effective response.
blog.post2.title: Opportunities for young people: Join the PleinGaz adventure!
blog.post2.summary: We are proud to offer training and employment opportunities to young talent. Find out how you can build your future with us.
blog.post3.title: How to choose the ideal gas cylinder for your home?
blog.post3.summary: With all the options available, it can be difficult to know what to choose. Follow our expert advice to find the gas cylinder that meets your needs.

blog.post4.summary: Discover our commitment to providing exceptional delivery service, with an emphasis on product safety and customer satisfaction.

hero.message: Since 2015, PleinGaz has been powering Cameroonian households with reliability, safety, and passion. Our mission is simple: to offer energy accessible to everyone, thanks to a robust network, certified products, and local service. With PleinGaz, every home benefits from safe and always available energy.
